name: Skarry - The Game
description:
Skarry is a 2d side scroller plat-former game. This game is an adventure game.

This is my first game that has a graphical user interface in it, that is soothing than the console output.

Do try it out so that I can make more games like this.

NOTE :- The game runs well on windows platform. Linux and mac versions are not tested yet on the platforms.

Comment below for any queries !!!
